message.jar-it.error.not_jar_glass: The Jar Cork must be used on the ceiling of a cube "jar" made out of Jar Glass.
message.jar-it.error.not_ceiling: The Jar Cork must be used on the ceiling of the jar to capture.
message.jar-it.error.gap: Either this jar is missing a block at %s or has an extra block at %s.
message.jar-it.error.not_square: The jar you tried to create must be cubic, but is %d x %d x %d.
message.jar-it.error.too_small: A jar must be at least 3 blocks in external diameter but this one is %d.
message.jar-it.error.too_large: A jar cannot be any larger than 64 blocks in external diameter but this one is %d.
